overview:
Joseph LeBas is the President of BWise - North America where he is responsible for the overall operating performance of the North American organization.

He has record of building profitable and innovative businesses in multiple industries and around the world. Most recently, Mr. LeBas built information management software firm Vivisimo into a worldwide leader, serving as Senior Vice President and General Manager, Americas, and earlier as Vice President of Worldwide Sales. Prior to Vivisimo, Mr. LeBas held a variety of executive, sales management, and sales/key account positions with PolyServe (acquired by HP), PeopleSoft, Corporate Express, Boston Scientific Corporation, and Revlon. He holds a Bachelors of Science degree in advertising from the University of Florida.
